game_intro: In this game you play an Elf that is trying to decorate a Christmas tree.
The decorations are all scattered around and you must pick all of them up and return them to the tree.
But be careful, the Grinch is chasing you! If he catches you, you lose!
If you get all the decorations back to the tree however, you win.
gameplay_rules: - When prompted to move, you can choose from 'up', 'down', 'left' or 'right'
- You can also just enter the first letters of each move.
- The Grinch's character symbol is a 'G'
- The Tree is represented by a 'T'
- The decorations are any of the following:
- You pick up a decoration by simply landing on top of it
- You have an inventory and can carry up to 4 decorations at a time.
- You drop off all decorations you carry by landing ontop of the tree
